questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'At 5 o'clock tomorrow, I _______ (work) on my project.'
Spot the mistake: 'She will be go to the market at this time tomorrow.'
Change the sentence to future continuous tense: 'I am reading a book.'
questions.answer: I will be reading a book.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'They _______ (not travel) to Europe this time next week.'
Spot the mistake: 'We will playing soccer at 3 pm.'
Change the sentence to future continuous tense: 'She is singing.'
Fill in the blank: 'Next summer, they _______ (celebrate) their 10th anniversary.'
Spot the mistake: 'This time next year, he will be live in Japan.'
Change the sentence to future continuous tense: 'They are playing video games.'
questions.answer: They will be playing video games.

questions.prompt: Spot the mistake: 'She will be not attending the meeting.'
Fill in the blank: 'By 10 o'clock, they _______ (watch) the movie for over an hour.'
Change the sentence to future continuous tense: 'He is cooking dinner.'
Spot the mistake: 'At noon tomorrow, she will be swim in the pool.'
Change the sentence to future continuous tense: 'They are studying for the exam.'
questions.answer: They will be studying for the exam.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'Don't call me at 7 pm because I _______ (have) dinner.'
Spot the mistake: 'This time next month, we will be travel to Italy.'
Change the sentence to future continuous tense: 'You are writing a letter.'
questions.answer: You will be writing a letter.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'In the evening, I _______ (relax) at home.'
Spot the mistake: 'I will be not playing tennis tomorrow.'
Change the sentence to future continuous tense: 'She is cleaning her room.'
questions.answer: She will be cleaning her room.
